name: Curry Quest In Space
description:
Small game made as End of Term Project for a Mobile Programming course.

Meant to be played on mobile devices. Mouse works too if playing the pc version.

Take control of a not-exactly-top-tier space ship, navigate an asteroid filled portion of space, take advantage of the ship tools to avoid overheat and repair damage caused by comets and enemy turrets, use the ship radar, gun and magnetic bullets to find traces to craft a guiding beacon, then follow it to the Mythic Space Curry of Legends! Which is a sparkling yellow ball, actually. But whatever.

Controls and Instructions:

- touch the blue bottom-left panel to look around, touch the various on-screen objects to interact with them. If something isn't a shade of gray it can probably be interacted with. The giant red button engage the ship controls panel.

- when hit, move around the ship control stick and the acceleration lever to regain control of its movement, then use the repair tool on the right to put out the flames caused by the impact.

- use the radar to find Curry-carrying asteroids, destroy them with the ship gun (periodically cool the gun down with the cyan button on the right), grab the now free Space Curry traces with the magnetic bullet, then use them to craft guiding beacons to find a path to the Mythic Space Curry and complete the level.
